sub_title: Full Professor. Dr. Ir. in Economic Geography and Urban Planning. Electronic Music Producer.
summary:
Lead researcher and author of the United Nations (UN-HABITAT) report "State of African Cities 2018: The Geography of African Investment". Expertise in spatial economic development, economic geography, spatial planning, urban and regional design, urban and regional competitiveness, economic network analysis, inequality studies, food security studies, foreign investment studies, corporate governance studies, urban and regional planning, world city research, economic development, global network studies, smart cities, green cities, climate change, renewable energy, happiness economics, sustainability and resilience studies, econometrics, GIS studies, social network analysis.

https://new.unhabitat.org/knowledge/research-and-publications

authors.headline: Full Professor. Dr. Ir. in Economic Geography and Urban Planning. Electronic Music Producer.

profile_positions.description:
The WITS professorial position concerns the “Chair in Economic Development”, within the Faculty of Commerce, Law and Management, at the School of Economic and Business Sciences. 

The Chair has been established and funded by WITS University in collaboration with the City of Johannesburg, and is aimed at applied urban and regional economic research within Johannesburg and other African cities. Since 2018 the Chair is also funded and supported by the Gauteng Provincial Government.
profile_positions.title: Full Professor

profile_positions.description: Ronald was the former Head of the Urban Competitiveness and Resilience (UCR) department at the IHS/Erasmus University Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description:
Ronald did his PhD at the Erasmus School of Economics / Erasmus University Rotterdam. He completed this in 2009 based on the dissertation NETSCAPE: Cities and Global Corporate Networks.

He also worked on developing a program for the Dutch Organization of Scientific Research (NWO) called Network of Networks, together with Bert v.d. Knaap. The program researched the evolution of internet and communications technology in The Netherlands and its impact on society and politics.

He also developed research for the Dutch Ministry for the Environment (MNP) concerning the development of sustainable networks between cities of the world. This was also done in collaboration with Bert v.d. Knaap.
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Ronald taught two studios on "glocal" development
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Ronald taught urban research and design studios called "Metanational Corporation". Prior to that he taught in studios run by Winy Maas (MVRDV)
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description:
Senior Project Leader at MVRDV (Winy Maas, Jacob van Rijs, Nathalie de Vries) Architects and Urban Planners. I was leader of the research department and worked on projects like Regionmaker, Pig City, Functionmixer, Climatizer, FARMAX, Container City, KM3, Scapino Ballet, Urban Eden. 

http://www.stroom.nl/paginas/pagina.php?pa_id=3767667 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3h_xqLWeIVo&list=PLCE89118319EC114F 

http://www.stroom.nl/paginas/pagina.php?pa_id=493033 https://vimeo.com/106793191
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Leader

profile_positions.description: Ronald taught two semesters called Edgeless City  together with Duzan Doepel
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Senior project leader at West 8 working on urban design projects like Bishopsgate competition in London (2nd prize). 1st prize Renzo Piano.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
Initiator, researcher and developer of the international housing and urban planning competition "Housing Generator", concerning urban integration and township development in South African cities (Johannesburg, Durban and East London). Developed together with Harm Tilman, Ewoud Netten, Mark van Beest and Bert van Meggelen (amongst others). See link: 

http://www.africaserver.nl/hg/front.htm
profile_positions.title: Researcher
